bs-statistics-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of statistics extension

bs-statistics-filters:

bs-statistics-interval-too-big: Error message that the interval is too big. It should not contain more than 35 interval steps.

bs-statistics-button-label-export:
Label for menu button that allows export of data into different formats
{{Identical|Export}}
bs-statistics-panel-title-result:
Label for panel title that holds the results of a statistics query in form of a table or chart
{{Identical|Result}}
bs-extendedstatistics-collection-fatalst:
Generic error message, when an unknown action was performed on the entry.
* $1 - Name of the action that was performed

Error message, when a user is not allowed to perform an action on the entry, that is linked to specific wikipage.
* $1 - Label of the action that the user is now allowed to perform
* $2 - Text with namespace of the wikipage, the user was trying to perform the action on

Error message, when a user is not allowed to perform an action on the entry.
* $1 - Label of the action that the user is now allowed to perform
System error message, when a "Title" object is required for a permission check, but was not provided
